about_the_game:
Run Pizza Run 2 returns with even more fun and challenges! The second installment of the game takes you into a new world of chaotic online competitions, where every move can be decisive. Forget about calm pizza deliveries — now it's not just about your order, but the title of the best delivery driver!

In this game, you will find exciting multiplayer modes where you can compete with friends or random players from around the world. Dynamic maps with various obstacles and unique victory conditions await you: from time races to battles for the title of the most agile driver.

Each map is a new challenge where you’ll have to maneuver through traffic, jump over gaps, and, of course, avoid falls and unexpected collisions. Agility, speed, and strategy are what set real champions apart!

In addition to the classic mode, Run Pizza Run 2 introduces strategic elements, turning every delivery into a test of wit and quick reflexes. Only the most agile and fastest will become legends of this chaotic world.

Join the fun, challenge your friends, or face off against strangers and become the one remembered as the best delivery driver!

name: Run Pizza Run 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100@ 3.6 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Online pizza delivery simulator! Deliver pizzas, compete with friends, and conquer a chaotic online world full of obstacles and unexpected challenges. New maps, modes, and tons of fun await you! Ready to become the best delivery driver? Embrace the chaos!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Japanese
